title: Very Toxic Rammus.
body: Riot please review my match history, please look at the latest game of ranked I played please. There was a terrible person in our lobby that was absolutely ruthless to one of our team mates. I do not know the team mate and I am not defending them. I need to know this persons account is disabled because this person was relentlessly nasty and awful to this player. Please review the game chat and please please do something about this player.

replies.body:
THE BOARDS ARE NOT THE PLACE TO DO THIS
SEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEND A SUPPPOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORT TICKET
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Report the player and then send a support ticket to riot to make sure they get it.
Link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Did you report him in the after chat thing
rammus takes it up the ass all game from jungle camps and champions, let him at least have some fun in champ select
rammus takes it up the ass all game from jungle camps and champions, let him at least have some fun in champ select
